Description: The following statement contains a magic number: while (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(cmd))  			{  				if (cmd.StartsWith("\"\""))  				{  					parts.Add(string.Empty);  					cmd = cmd.Substring(2).TrimStart(' ');  					continue;  				}    				foreach (var regEx in _stringRegExps)  				{  					var m = Regex.Match(cmd' regEx);  					if (!m.Success) continue;    					parts.Add(m.Value);  					cmd = Regex.Replace(cmd' regEx' "").TrimStart(' ');  					break;  				}  			}
